comments: Capela (ATL) brings his hand forward towards Butler's (MIA) path and marginal contact occurs off ball.
Capela (ATL) brings his hand forward towards Butler's (MIA) front and marginal contact occurs during the drive.
Hunter (ATL) is moving alongside Adebayo's (MIA) path and absorbs the contact during the drive.
Hunter (ATL) moves laterally into Butler's (MIA) body and initiates contact as he defends the driving shot attempt.
Collins (ATL) is already in Robinson's (MIA) path when contact occurs and he does not deliver contact.
Adebayo (MIA) is the last player to touch the ball before the ball goes out of bounds.  Possession is correctly awarded to Atlanta.
Adebayo (MIA) is already in Collins' (ATL) path and absorbs the contact during the screen.
Adebayo (MIA) jumps to Collins' (ATL) side and marginal contact occurs after Collins has lost control of the ball.
Strus (MIA) cleanly dislodges the ball from Collins (ATL).
Butler (MIA) is moving alongside Collins' (ATL) path and marginal contact occurs during the drive.
Adebayo (MIA) steps forward into Young's (ATL) space and initiates contact on the perimeter.  The contact from Adebayo occurs prior to Young's upward shooting motion.
The ball makes contact with the rim as Collins (ATL) attempts to gain control of the ball at 37.3 seconds.  The shot clock should have been reset to 14 with Atlanta retaining possession.
Vincent (MIA) is already in Capela's (ATL) path when contact occurs and he does not deliver contact.
Vincent (MIA) is already in Hunter's (ATL) path when contact occurs and he does not deliver contact.
Vincent (MIA) commits a take foul on Young (ATL).
Vincent (MIA) commits a take foul on Young (ATL).
Martin (MIA) is already in Hunter's (ATL) path and does not deliver contact as the defenders switch.
Collins (ATL) legally contests Butler's (MIA) jump shot attempt.
Wright (ATL) engages with Strus (MIA) and as Strus' momentum carries him towards the lane, marginal contact occurs as Strus' momentum carries him towards the rebound.
